file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Lockdown API
tags:
  - name: By Countries
    description: All NPIs by country
  - name: World
    description: Only lockdown statuses for whole world
  - name: By Measures
    description: Specific NPIs for country
paths:
  /status/world/{date}:
    get:
      tags:
        - World
      summary: Retrieve lockdown status of all countries for date
      parameters:
        - name: date
          description: Date of status snapshot
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of NPIs for date. Additional property is lockdown date."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    lockdown:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lockdown'
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
  /status/world/{startDate}/{endDate}:
    get:
      tags:
        - World
      summary: Retrieve lockdown status of all countries for date range. Maximum date range is 70 days
      parameters:
        - name: startDate
          description: Date of status snapshot
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          description: Date of status snapshot. Date range not more than 70 days
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of NPIs for date. Additional property is lockdown date."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    lockdown:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lockdown'
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
  /status/{iso}/{date}:
    get:
      tags:
        - By Countries
      summary: "Retrieve all NPIs for country by date"
      parameters:
        - name: iso
          in: path
          description: ISO2 or ISO3 country code
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: date
          description: Date of status snapshot
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of NPIs for date"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  lockdown:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lockdown'

        default:
          description: Unexpected error
  /status/{iso}/{startDate}/{endDate}:
    get:
      tags:
        - By Countries
      summary: "Retrieve all NPIs for country by date range. Maximum date range is 70 days."
      parameters:
        - name: iso
          in: path
          description: ISO2 or ISO3 country code
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: startDate
          description: Start Date of range
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          description: End Date of range (range not more than 70 days)
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of NPIs for by date"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    lockdown:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lockdown'
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
  /measures/{iso}/{startDate}/{endDate}:
    get:
      tags:
        - By Measures
      summary: "Retrieve specific NPIs for country by date range. Maximum date range is 70 days."
      parameters:
        - name: iso
          in: path
          description: ISO2 or ISO3 country code
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: startDate
          description: Start Date of range
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          description: End Date of range (range not more than 70 days)
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: measures
          description: Measures for retrieving
          in: query
          schema:
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of NPIs"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Lockdown'
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
  /totals/lockdown/{startDate}/{endDate}:
    get:
      tags:
        - World
      summary: "Retrieve count of countries in lockdown and affected people"
      parameters:
        - name: startDate
          description: Start Date of range
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: endDate
          description: End Date of range (range not more than 70 days)
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "List of counters"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    lockdown:
                      type: number
                    affected:
                      type: number
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
components:
  schemas:
    Measure:
      type: object
      properties:
        label:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
        '#date+start':
          type: string
          format: date
        '#date+end':
          type: string
          format: date
        '#meta+url':
          type: string
        '#country+code+iso3':
          type: string
    Lockdown:
      type: object
      properties:
        iso:
          type: string
        max_gathering: 
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Measure'
        measure:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Measure'
        land:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Measure'
        sea:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Measure'
        flight:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Measure'
